welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hampton Bays! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal town known for its beautiful beaches and bustling marinas. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hampton Bays has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and luxurious experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Hampton Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at East Hampton Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport houses all of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves as the primary departure and arrival area for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves as the primary departure and arrival area for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
